HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Balíkovna na adresu: 79 Kč, Kurýr GLS: 89 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 3 000 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Next working day delivery is possible for items in stock at the Třinec warehouse if ordered by 12:00 with COD. If the item is at the Brno warehouse, delivery is extended by 2-3 working days. Bank transfer payment extends delivery by 1-3 working days.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Balíkovna: 55 Kč, GLS ParcelShop: 59 Kč, Zásilkovna: 99 Kč. Free shipping for orders over 3 000 Kč.
PARCEL_SHOPS.cod_surcharge: Balíkovna: 49 Kč, GLS ParcelShop: Zdarma, Zásilkovna: 30 Kč

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Colosus.cz provides home delivery via Česká pošta (Balíkovna na adresu) and GLS. Parcel shop delivery is available through Balíkovna, GLS ParcelShop, and Zásilkovna. Free personal pickup is offered at their stores in Třinec and Brno. PRICING: Home delivery costs 79-89 Kč. Parcel shop delivery costs 55-99 Kč. All orders over 3,000 Kč qualify for free shipping. In-store pickup is always free. COD surcharges range from 30 Kč to 50 Kč depending on the carrier, but are free for GLS ParcelShop and in-store pickup. NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery speed is dependent on the stock location (Třinec or Brno). Next-day delivery is possible for orders from the Třinec warehouse placed by 12:00 with COD payment. No specific express or weekend delivery services are offered. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly laid out on a dedicated page. Prices for both shipping and COD are specified for each carrier, which is very helpful for customers. However, information is missing regarding specific delivery timeframes for each service, weekend delivery, parcel lockers, and policies for bulky items.
